patthana16.78:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana16.78:2.1: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.78:3.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.78:3.1_1: nanadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nadassanena
patthana16.78:3.1_2: pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naanidassanasappaṭigho nanadassanena pahātabbo dhammo
patthana16.78:3.1_3: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā
patthana16.78:3.1_4: nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanadassanena pahātabbo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nanadassanena
